name: Battle Roll-ale
description:
Fight your friends in this dice-themed action/puzzle game!

There are three different game modes you can choose from:

  • Battle: Roll around the arena, collect power-ups and attack your enemies. Last die standing wins!
  • Race to ten: Roll around the arena and collect power-ups as fast as possible. First die to collect ten power-ups wins! (Tip: you can use your power-ups to stun the other player!). 
  • Collect them all: Roll around the arena and collect all the power-ups on the map. The die who collects more power-ups wins!

Note: we highly recommend playing against another human if you can, but if you can't you can also play against our AI (be warned, the Hard / Brutal difficulties are very hard!). If you don't have anyone nearby to play with, software such as Parsec can be used to play online.

Controls / Instructions

Player 1: Use W/A/S/D to roll up/left/down/right. Press E to attack when a powered face is facing up!

Player 2: Use the arrow keys to roll up/left/down/right. Press the right shift button to attack when a powered face is facing up!

See the below image for instructions (Note: you can only attack in the Battle and Race modes!).

Troubleshooting

We recommend running the HTML5 version in full screen (this fixes some minor graphical issues).

If you are running the Windows version, please run "Battle Rollale.exe" (the other executable is an old version that was mistakenly included).
